comment:
"Текст в казарме аколитов, можно спрятать с чеком в тайник
Бумажный дневник"

languages.text:
"После последнего уплотнения меня перевели в казарму Парий. И все, что говорят об этих уродах — правда. Уж не знаю, воспитали ли их такими, или у них и правда нет души, но от соседства с ними мне дурно каждое мгновение. Холодные, равнодушные, пустые внутри существа, прикидывающиеся людьми. Когда они бьют или казнят пассажиров, им все равно. Нормальному человеку противно вышибать кому-то мозги... ну, или наоборот, ему это нравится. Но не им — им просто плевать. Будь моя воля, я бы бросил их в трюм к остальным мутантам, но... На них не действуют псайкерские штучки — совсем не действуют. Полезно, когда летишь на корабле, набитом разъяренными псайкерами.
Одного такого вчера пришлось переводить из общего трюма в отдельные покои. Этот предательский кусок дерьма подстрекал других к мятежу, и почтенный Корабельный исповедник велел хорошенько избить его. Мы лупили его часа два, к концу мой проклятый кашель усилился был уже просто невыносим.
Боюсь, как бы меня не вызвали в целительский отсек. Если командование узнает об этой дряни в моих легких, меня просто спишут через шлюз. Вся надежда на аугмент, поставленный мне тем странным механиком на Флации Прима. Жутковатый тип, и машинерия у него жутковатая, наверняка все это глубоко против закона Империума. Но выбора у меня не было — жалкой трюмной крысе-пустотнику никогда не забраться так высоко, чтобы его болячками занялся настоящий Механикус. Буду надеяться, что пронесет".

traits.locale_text:
"После последнего уплотнения меня перевели в казарму Парий. И все, что говорят об этих уродах — правда. Уж не знаю, воспитали ли их такими, или у них и правда нет души, но от соседства с ними мне дурно каждое мгновение. Холодные, равнодушные, пустые внутри существа, прикидывающиеся людьми. Боюсь, как бы меня не вызвали в целительский отсек. Если командование узнает об этой дряни в моих легких, меня просто спишут через шлюз. Но выбора у меня не было — жалкой трюмной крысе-пустотоплавателю никогда не забраться так высоко, чтобы его болячками занялся настоящий Механикус. Буду надеяться, что пронесет".

languages.text:
"After the last shift consolidation, they transferred me to the Pariah barracks. And everything they say about these freaks is true. I don't know if they're raised this way or if they really don't have a soul, but just being near them makes me feel sick to my stomach. Cold, unfeeling, empty creatures pretending to be human. They beat and execute the passengers like it's nothing. A normal person is disgusted at the thought of smashing a person's skull... well, either that, or they like it. But not them — they don't care one bit. If it was up to me, I'd toss them in the hold with the rest of the mutants, but... the psyker tricks don't work on them at all. Very handy when you're travelling on a ship stuffed full of enraged psykers.
I had to move one of the psykers from the communal hold to separate quarters. That traitorous piece of shit was encouraging the others to revolt, and our esteemed Ship's Confessor ordered us to give him a good hiding. We beat him for two hours or so, and by the end my damned cough had got so bad it was unbearable.
I'm worried I'll be called in to see the chirurgeon. If command find out about the crap in my lungs, they'll toss me straight out of the airlock. My only hope is my new augmetic, though the guy who fitted it on Flacia Prima was strange. He gave me the creeps, and so did all his machinery. No doubt it was all illegal under the Imperium's laws. But I didn't have a choice — a wretched bilge rat of a voidsman would never rise high enough to have his aches and pains treated by someone from the Adeptus Mechanicus. I'm just going to hope that this thing clears up on its own."

I don't know if they're raised this way or if they really don't have a soul, but just being near them makes me feel sick to my stomach. Cold, unfeeling, empty creatures pretending to be human. They beat and execute the passengers like it's nothing. A normal person is disgusted at the thought of smashing a person's skull... well, either that, or they like it. Very handy when you're travelling on a ship stuffed full of enraged psykers.
I had to move one of psykers from the communal hold to separate quarters. I'm worried I'll be called in to see the medicus. If command find out about the crap in my lungs, they'll toss me straight out of the airlock. I'm just going to hope that this thing clears up on its own."

languages.text:
“最后一次换岗之后，他们把我调到了无魂者的营房里。关于那群怪物，他们说的一切都是真的。我不知道他们就是被这样养大的，还是他们真的没有灵魂，但只要接近他们，我就会感到胃里难受。他们是一群冰冷、无情、空洞的怪物，只是看起来像人类罢了。他们会殴打、处决乘客，仿佛这一切全都无所谓一样。如果是正常人的话，一想到要打碎另一个人脑袋，恐怕只会觉得恶心……呃，虽然也有人喜欢这样。不过那群人，他们一点都不在乎。如果由我说了算，我会把他们和剩下的变种人关在一起，不过……灵能方面的力量对他们完全不起作用。这艘船上挤满了怒不可遏的灵能者，如果有人不怕灵能，那可真是帮大忙了。
我不得不把其中一个灵能者从公共区域带走，关在了单独的舱室里。那个叛徒一直在怂恿其他人造反，我们尊敬的告解者命令我们好好教训他一顿。我们揍了他两个小时左右，最后我咳嗽得实在是太厉害，已经受不了了。
我担心他们会让我去看医生。如果指挥官发现了我肺里的那些破烂，他们肯定会直接把我从气闸里扔出去。我唯一的希望，就是新的植入物了。不过，给弗拉西娅·普里马安装植入物的那个人是个怪人，他和他那些机器让我感到毛骨悚然。毫无疑问，根据帝国的法律，这种行为是违法的，但我别无选择。我只不过是最底层的虚空士兵，永远都不可能爬到足够高的位置，让机械修会的人来治好我的病痛。我只希望，我的身体能自己慢慢好起来。”
languages.original_text:
"After the last shift consolidation, they transferred me to the Pariah barracks. And everything they say about these freaks is true. I don't know if they're raised this way or if they really don't have a soul, but just being near them makes me feel sick to my stomach. Cold, unfeeling, empty creatures pretending to be human. They beat and execute the passengers like it's nothing. A normal person is disgusted at the thought of smashing a person's skull... well, either that, or they like it. But not them — they don't care one bit. If it was up to me, I'd toss them in the hold with the rest of the mutants, but... the psyker tricks don't work on them at all. Very handy when you're travelling on a ship stuffed full of enraged psykers.
I had to move one of the psykers from the communal hold to separate quarters. That traitorous piece of shit was encouraging the others to revolt, and our esteemed Ship's Confessor ordered us to give him a good hiding. We beat him for two hours or so, and by the end my damned cough had got so bad it was unbearable.
I'm worried I'll be called in to see the chirurgeon. If command find out about the crap in my lungs, they'll toss me straight out of the airlock. My only hope is my new augmetic, though the guy who fitted it on Flacia Prima was strange. He gave me the creeps, and so did all his machinery. No doubt it was all illegal under the Imperium's laws. But I didn't have a choice — a wretched bilge rat of a voidsman would never rise high enough to have his aches and pains treated by someone from the Adeptus Mechanicus. I'm just going to hope that this thing clears up on its own."

traits.locale_text:
“最后一次换岗之后，他们把我调到了弃民的营房里。关于那群怪物，他们说的一切都是真的。我不知道他们就是被这样养大的，还是他们真的没有灵魂，但只要接近他们，我就会感到胃里难受。他们是一群冰冷、无情、空洞的怪物，只是看起来像人类罢了。他们会殴打、处决乘客，仿佛这一切全都无所谓一样。如果是正常人的话，一想到要打碎另一个人脑袋，恐怕只会觉得恶心……呃，虽然也有人喜欢这样。不过那群人，他们一点都不在乎。如果由我说了算，我会把他们和剩下的变种人关在一起，不过……灵能方面的力量对他们完全不起作用。这艘船上挤满了怒不可遏的灵能者，如果有人不怕灵能，那可真是帮大忙了。

我担心他们会让我去看医生。如果指挥官发现了我肺里的那些破烂，他们肯定会直接把我从气闸里扔出去。我唯一的希望，就是新的植入物了。不过，给弗拉西娅·普里马安装植入物的那个人是个怪人，他和他那些机器让我感到毛骨悚然。毫无疑问，根据帝国的法律，这种行为是违法的，但我别无选择。我只不过是最底层的虚空士兵，永远都不可能爬到足够高的位置，让机械修会的人来治好我的病痛。我只希望，我的身体能自己慢慢好起来。”

languages.text:
«Tras la consolidación del último turno, me asignaron a los barracones de los parias. Todo lo que se dice de esos espantakos es cierto. No sé si es que los crían así o si carecen de alma, pero estar cerca de ellos me pone enfermo. Son seres fríos, insensibles y vacíos que fingen ser humanos. Maltratan y ejecutan a los pasajeros como si nada. A una persona normal le repugna la idea de aplastar el cráneo de otro... o le gusta, vale. Pero ¿a estas cosas? Les da absolutamente igual. Si por mí fuera, los echaría a la bodega con los otros mutantes, pero... los trucos psíquicos no funcionan con ellos. Así que son útiles al viajar en una nave llena de psíquicos furiosos.
He tenido que trasladar a uno de los psíquicos de la bodega comunal a un camarote aislado. El puto traidor estaba animando a los otros a rebelarse y el venerable confesor de la nave nos ordenó que le diéramos una buena somanta. Lo apaleamos durante casi dos horas y, para el final, la maldita tos era casi insoportable.
Me preocupa que me lleven a ver al cirujano. Si los mandos se enteran de la mierda que tengo en los pulmones, me echarán por la esclusa. Mi única esperanza es este nuevo aumético, aunque el tipo que me lo instaló en Flacia Prima era raro de narices. Me daba repelús, igual que su maquinaria. Seguro que todo ello era ilegal en el Imperium. Pero no tenía elección. Un miserable infante del vacío como yo nunca llegará tan alto como para que alguien del Adeptus Mechanicus trate sus dolencias. Tendré que esperar a ver si esto se me pasa solo».

But not them — they don't care one bit. If it was up to me, I'd toss them in the hold with the rest of the mutants, but... the psyker tricks don't work on them at all. Very handy when you're travelling on a ship stuffed full of enraged psykers.
I had to move one of the psykers from the communal hold to separate quarters. That traitorous piece of shit was encouraging the others to revolt, and our esteemed Ship's Confessor ordered us to give him a good hiding. We beat him for two hours or so, and by the end my damned cough had got so bad it was unbearable.
I'm worried I'll be called in to see the chirurgeon. If command find out about the crap in my lungs, they'll toss me straight out of the airlock. But I didn't have a choice — a wretched bilge rat of a voidsman would never rise high enough to have his aches and pains treated by someone from the Adeptus Mechanicus. languages.text:
「最後のシフト整理の後、私はパーリアの兵舎に移された。この異常な奴らについては散々いろんなことを聞かされてきたが、どれも本当だった。そういう風に育成されたのか本当に魂がないのかわからないが、奴らの近くにいるだけで気持ち悪くなる。冷酷で感情がない、人間のふりをした空っぽの生き物だ。何でもないように乗客を殴り、処刑する。まともな人間なら人の頭蓋骨を叩き割ることに嫌悪感を抱くか…まあ、中にはそれを好んでやる奴もいるだろうが、大概はそのどちらかだろう。だが、奴らはまったく気にしていない。俺に権利があるなら奴らを他の変異体と同じ部屋に放り込むが…異能者の力は奴らにはまったく効かない。怒り狂った異能者をいっぱい積んだ船で移動するときにはとても便利だ。
異能者のひとりを共同部屋から別の部屋に移動させなければならなかった。あの裏切り者のクソ野郎は他の連中に反乱を促していたが、船の懺悔師の命令で奴を徹底的に隠すことにした。2時間くらい殴り続けたが、最後には俺の咳が酷くなって耐えきれなくなった。
チラ－ジョンに呼ばれないか心配だ。俺の肺の状態を司令部が知れば、すぐにエアーロックから放り出されるだろう。新しく交換したオーグメティックに期待しているが、フラシア・プリマを装着した男は変な奴だった。気味が悪かったしあいつの機械も不気味だった。帝国で違法だったのも理解できる。でも、俺には選択の余地はなかった――俺みたいな出来損ないのヴォイズマンは、帝国技術局の人間の治療を受けられるほど出世することはない。とにかく自然治癒してくれることを祈る。」
languages.original_text:
"After the last shift consolidation, they transferred me to the Pariah barracks. And everything they say about these freaks is true. I don't know if they're raised this way or if they really don't have a soul, but just being near them makes me feel sick to my stomach. Cold, unfeeling, empty creatures pretending to be human. They beat and execute the passengers like it's nothing. A normal person is disgusted at the thought of smashing a person's skull... well, either that, or they like it. But not them — they don't care one bit. If it was up to me, I'd toss them in the hold with the rest of the mutants, but... the psyker tricks don't work on them at all. Very handy when you're travelling on a ship stuffed full of enraged psykers.
I had to move one of the psykers from the communal hold to separate quarters. That traitorous piece of shit was encouraging the others to revolt, and our esteemed Ship's Confessor ordered us to give him a good hiding. We beat him for two hours or so, and by the end my damned cough had got so bad it was unbearable.
I'm worried I'll be called in to see the chirurgeon. If command find out about the crap in my lungs, they'll toss me straight out of the airlock. My only hope is my new augmetic, though the guy who fitted it on Flacia Prima was strange. He gave me the creeps, and so did all his machinery. No doubt it was all illegal under the Imperium's laws. But I didn't have a choice — a wretched bilge rat of a voidsman would never rise high enough to have his aches and pains treated by someone from the Adeptus Mechanicus. I'm just going to hope that this thing clears up on its own."

traits.locale_text:
「最後のシフト整理の後、私はパーリアの兵舎に移された。この異常な奴らについては散々いろんなことを聞かされてきたが、どれも本当だった。そういう風に育成されたのか本当に魂がないのかわからないが、奴らの近くにいるだけで気持ち悪くなる。冷酷で感情がない、人間のふりをした空っぽの生き物だ。何でもないように乗客を殴り、処刑する。まともな人間なら人の頭蓋骨を叩き割ることに嫌悪感を抱くか…まあ、中にはそれを好んでやる奴もいるだろうが、大概はそのどちらかだろう。だが、奴らはまったく気にしていない。俺に権利があるなら奴らを他の変異体と同じ部屋に放り込むが…異能者の力は奴らにはまったく効かない。怒り狂った異能者をいっぱい積んだ船で移動するときにはとても便利だ。

languages.text:
"Nach der letzten Schichtzusammenlegung wurde ich zur Paria-Kaserne versetzt. Und alles, was man über diese Freaks erzählt, ist wahr. Ich weiß nicht, ob sie so erzogen werden oder wirklich keine Seele haben, aber schon in ihrer Nähe wird mir speiübel. Kalte, gefühllose, leere Kreaturen, die so tun, als wären sie Menschen. Sie schlagen die Passagier und richten sie hin, als ob es gar nichts wäre. Ein normaler Mensch findet den Gedanken abstoßend, jemand anderem den Schädel einzuschlagen ... oder es gefällt ihm sogar. Aber die sind anders – es ist ihnen völlig gleichgültig. Wenn es nach mir ginge, würde ich sie zu den anderen Mutanten sperren, aber ... die Tricks der Psioniker funktionieren bei ihnen überhaupt nicht. Ziemlich praktisch, wenn du auf einem Schiff voller wütender Psioniker reist.
Ich musste einen der Psioniker aus dem Gemeinschaftsbereich in ein separates Quartier bringen. Das verräterische Stück Scheiße rief die anderen zur Revolte auf, und unser geschätzter Konfessor ordnete an, ihn ordentlich zu verprügeln. Das haben wir dann ungefähr zwei Stunden lang gemacht, und gegen Ende war mein verdammter Husten so schlimm geworden, dass ich es kaum aushalten konnte.
Ich befürchte, dass ich zum Chirurgeum bestellt werde. Wenn das Oberkommando von dem Mist in meiner Lunge erfährt, werde ich sofort aus der Luftschleuse geworfen. Meine einzige Hoffnung ist meine neue Augmentation, aber der Typ, der sie mir auf Flacia Prima angepasst hat, war seltsam. Ich fand ihn unheimlich, genau wie seine ganzen Maschinen. Das Ganze entsprach mit Sicherheit nicht den Gesetzen des Imperiums. Aber ich hatte keine Wahl – eine kleine Raumfahrerratte steigt niemals so weit auf, dass ihre Wehwehchen von jemandem vom Adeptus Mechanicus behandelt werden. Ich kann nur hoffen, dass sich diese Sache von selber regelt."

Meine einzige Hoffnung ist meine neue Augmentation, aber der Typ, der sie mir auf Flacia Prima angepasst hat, war seltsam. Ich fand ihn unheimlich, genau wie seine ganzen Maschinen. languages.text:
« Suite au dernier renforcement des patrouilles, ils m'ont transféré aux quartiers des parias, et autant dire que toutes les rumeurs à leur sujet sont vraies. Je ne sais pas s'ils sont éduqués de cette manière ou s'ils n'ont vraiment pas d'âme, mais rien que de les savoir à proximité me rend malade. Ce sont des créatures froides, vides, dénuées de sentiments, mais qui se prétendent humaines. Ces gens tabassent et exécutent les passagers sans faire preuve du moindre remords. Une personne normale serait horrifiée à l'idée de fracasser la tête de quelqu'un d'autre... quand d'autres, au contraire, prennent leur pied à le faire. Mais pas eux. Eux, ils ne ressentent rien. Si ça ne tenait qu'à moi, je les enfermerais avec les autres mutants, mais... ils ne sont pas sensibles aux capacités des psykers. Plutôt pratique sur un vaisseau rempli jusqu'à la cale de psykers enragés.
J'ai dû envoyer un psyker en isolement. Cette petite merde poussait les autres à la révolte, et notre très estimé confesseur nous a ordonné de lui donner une bonne correction. On l'a passé à tabac pendant deux bonnes heures, mais à la fin, ma toux était devenue incontrôlable.
J'ai peur qu'on m'envoie voir le chirurgeon. Si la hiérarchie apprend ce que j'ai dans les poumons, je suis bon pour l'expulsion. Je ne peux que compter sur mon nouvel augmétique, même si le type qui l'a installé sur Flacia Prima était franchement bizarre. Il m'a donné la chair de poule, avec tous ses engins. Autant dire que tout ce qu'il a fait était illégal, mais je n'avais pas le choix. Un simple cosmomarin de fond de cale comme moi ne pourra jamais se faire soigner par l'Adeptus Mechanicus. Il ne me reste plus qu'à espérer que cette chose disparaisse toute seule. »
languages.original_text:
"After the last shift consolidation, they transferred me to the Pariah barracks. And everything they say about these freaks is true. I don't know if they're raised this way or if they really don't have a soul, but just being near them makes me feel sick to my stomach. Cold, unfeeling, empty creatures pretending to be human. They beat and execute the passengers like it's nothing. A normal person is disgusted at the thought of smashing a person's skull... well, either that, or they like it. But not them — they don't care one bit. If it was up to me, I'd toss them in the hold with the rest of the mutants, but... the psyker tricks don't work on them at all. Very handy when you're travelling on a ship stuffed full of enraged psykers.
I had to move one of the psykers from the communal hold to separate quarters. That traitorous piece of shit was encouraging the others to revolt, and our esteemed Ship's Confessor ordered us to give him a good hiding. We beat him for two hours or so, and by the end my damned cough had got so bad it was unbearable.
I'm worried I'll be called in to see the chirurgeon. If command find out about the crap in my lungs, they'll toss me straight out of the airlock. My only hope is my new augmetic, though the guy who fitted it on Flacia Prima was strange. He gave me the creeps, and so did all his machinery. No doubt it was all illegal under the Imperium's laws. But I didn't have a choice — a wretched bilge rat of a voidsman would never rise high enough to have his aches and pains treated by someone from the Adeptus Mechanicus. I'm just going to hope that this thing clears up on its own."

Ce sont des créatures froides, vides, dénuées de sentiments, mais qui se prétendent humaines. Ces gens tabassent et exécutent les passagers sans faire preuve du moindre remords. J'ai dû envoyer un psyker en isolement. Cette petite merde poussait les autres à la révolte, et notre très estimé confesseur nous a ordonné de lui donner une bonne correction. On l'a passé à tabac pendant deux bonnes heures, mais à la fin, ma toux était devenue incontrôlable.

Autant dire que tout ce qu'il a fait était illégal, mais je n'avais pas le choix. Un simple cosmomarin de bas étage comme moi ne pourra jamais se faire soigner par l'Adeptus Mechanicus. Il ne me reste plus qu'à espérer que cette chose disparaisse toute seule. »

languages.text:
"Son vardiya takviyesinden sonra beni Parya koğuşlarına naklettiler. Bu ucubeler hakkında söyledikleri her şey doğruymuş. Bu şekilde mi yetiştirilmişler yoksa gerçekten bir ruhları yok mu bilmiyorum ama sırf onların yanında olmak bile midemi bulandırıyor. İnsan numarası yapan, soğuk, duygusuz, boş yaratıklar. Yolcuları durduk yere dövüp idam ediyorlar. Normal bir insan, birinin kafatasını ezme düşüncesinden iğrenir. Yani ya iğrenir ya da bundan hoşlanır. Onlar ise farklı, zerre umurlarında değil. Elimde olsaydı onları diğer mutantlarla beraber hücreye tıkardım ama ruhsezer numaraları onların üzerinde bir nebze bile olsa işe yaramıyor. Bir gemi dolusu öfkeli ruhsezerle seyahat ederken böyle dirençli olmak şart.
Ruhsezerlerin birini normal hücrelerden ayrı bir bölmeye nakletmek zorunda kaldım. Hain serseri, diğerlerini isyana teşvik ediyordu. Gemimizin değerli Günah Çıkarıcısı da bize onu iyice bir sopalama emri verdi. Onu yaklaşık iki saat boyunca dövdük, bu iki saatin sonunda öksürüğüm o kadar azıttı ki artık tahammül edemeyecek gibi oldum.
Cerraha görünmem gerekeceğinden endişeleniyordum. Eğer üstlerim ciğerlerimdeki haltı öğrenirse beni anında hava kilidinden fırlatırlar. Tek umudum yeni ogmetiğim ama Flacia Prima'daki onu takan eleman bir tuhaftı. O da, kullandığı makineler de tüylerimi diken diken ediyordu. İmparatorluk kanunlarınca yasa dışı olduğuna şüphe yok ama başka seçeneğim yoktu. Dandik bir uçsuz eri, asla ağrılarını ve sızılarını Adeptus Mechanicus'tan birine tedavi ettirebilecek kadar yükselemez. Bu şeyin kendi kendine geçmesini ummaktan başka çarem yok."
languages.original_text:
"After the last shift consolidation, they transferred me to the Pariah barracks. And everything they say about these freaks is true. I don't know if they're raised this way or if they really don't have a soul, but just being near them makes me feel sick to my stomach. Cold, unfeeling, empty creatures pretending to be human. They beat and execute the passengers like it's nothing. A normal person is disgusted at the thought of smashing a person's skull... well, either that, or they like it. But not them — they don't care one bit. If it was up to me, I'd toss them in the hold with the rest of the mutants, but... the psyker tricks don't work on them at all. Very handy when you're travelling on a ship stuffed full of enraged psykers.
I had to move one of the psykers from the communal hold to separate quarters. That traitorous piece of shit was encouraging the others to revolt, and our esteemed Ship's Confessor ordered us to give him a good hiding. We beat him for two hours or so, and by the end my damned cough had got so bad it was unbearable.
I'm worried I'll be called in to see the chirurgeon. If command find out about the crap in my lungs, they'll toss me straight out of the airlock. My only hope is my new augmetic, though the guy who fitted it on Flacia Prima was strange. He gave me the creeps, and so did all his machinery. No doubt it was all illegal under the Imperium's laws. But I didn't have a choice — a wretched bilge rat of a voidsman would never rise high enough to have his aches and pains treated by someone from the Adeptus Mechanicus. I'm just going to hope that this thing clears up on its own."
